ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 16 Channel H.264 DVR (1TB hard drive pre-installed); 12). Sony CCD 420 TV Lines Waterproof Cameras ; 12). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 2) Power Adapter Units
DVR adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously
Mobile phone surveillance (Win CE/Symbian/iPhone/Blackberry/Android)
Pre-made 60ft Video Power Combined Cables makes installing easy.
1/3'' Sony CCD Cameras provides 420 TV Lines very good resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: 16 Channel CCTV Security Surveillance Standalone H.264 DVR w/ HDMI port, DVD-RW, 1000GB Hard Drive + 12 x Sony CCD Waterproof Day Night Cameras 60ft Video Power Cables Complete System
